function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on tracking applications for monitoring population dynamics","Impact":"Limited reliance on honest reporting and community cooperation","Mitigation":"Increase use of extensive testing, improve reporting transparency, and promote community education and cooperation","Technologies":"Testing kits, data analytics for transparent reporting, community engagement platforms","People":"Population in countries relying on tracking applications","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Collective behavior changes due to past epidemic experience","Impact":"Improved hygiene, social distancing, communication, trust, and cooperation","Mitigation":"Continuous public health education and awareness, policy support for hygiene and social distancing, fostering trust and cooperation","Technologies":"Public health education campaigns, policy enforcement, communication platforms","People":"Population in areas affected by past epidemics","Owner":"Public health agencies, community leaders"},{"Description":"Shift from patient-centered to community-centered care in healthcare systems","Impact":"Inadequate response to pandemics, lack of long-term planning","Mitigation":"Implement community-centered care, develop long-term pandemic plans, integrate population health into healthcare systems","Technologies":"Community health programs, long-term pandemic planning tools, population health management platforms","People":"Healthcare professionals, policymakers, public health agencies","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government"}]}
